CustomField.description: This field can be used to define assessment stages within the application stages. This way you could define multiple rounds of assessments within 1 stage. Use dependent picklists to manage which Assessment Stages belong to which Application Stage.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field can be used to define assessment stages within the application stages. This way you could define multiple rounds of assessments within 1 stage. Use dependent picklists to manage which Assessment Stages belong to which Application Stage.
CustomField.label: Assessment Stage
